出示
引起
[经济学]生利

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"创造，制作"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: create, compose, design, invent, make, produce
means: create ： 侧重创造出来的东西以前并不存在，或者指独具特色的创作。
compose ： 多指音乐或诗歌、画的创作。
design ： 主要指在艺术或技术领域的创作设计，强调构思多于实际制造。
invent ： 主要用于科技领域，指通过思考、研究或实验制造出新的前所未有、极为有用的东西。
make ： 最普通用词，指任何东西的创作或制造。
produce ： 指产品的生产，或作品创作的完成。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"产生，实现"之意。
means: effect ： 侧重成功地完成一件要做的事情，强调结果或影响。
cause ： 强调事物的因果关系。
produce ： 侧重有意或无意地产生出好的或坏的，实际可见的效果。
realize ： 着重指把过去的计划或意愿变成现实。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"做，制造"之意。
means: make ： 普通用词，很常用，含义广，既可指制造具体的东西，也可指完成一种行为。
fabricate ： 特指按照标准样式制作或把材料或部件组合成一个整体。
manufacture ： 正式用词，一般指用机器大规模地批量生产各种生活或生产用品。
produce ： 普通用词，侧重大量地生产出各种生产用品和生活用品。强调结果。也用于引申。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均含有"产品，制品"之意。
means: manufacture ： 一般指机器大量制造的产品。
produce ： 多指农产品(尤指蔬菜水果等)。
product ： 一般指工业产品，也可泛指各种各样的产品。
production ： 含义广泛，不同场合有不同的意思，可表示"产品，产物"，尤指人类智力或艺术劳动的产品。

sentence.Network_en: It will produce electricity more cheaply than a nuclear plant.
sentence.Network_cn: 它的发电成本要比核电站低。

sentence.Network_en: The formalization of co-operation between the republics would produce progress.
sentence.Network_cn: 正式确立合作关系将会促进共和国之间合作的顺利进展。

sentence.Network_en: Usually a woman's breasts produce milk spontaneously after the birth.
sentence.Network_cn: 女性的乳房通常在产后会自然泌乳。

字典中出字的解释 ... (5) 出现;显露[ appear;show] (7) 生产;产生[ produce] (9) 高出;超出[ exceed;go beyond;surpass].
九年级英语单词表 ... notice 注意到；察觉到 produce 生产；制造 pleasant 合意的；舒适的.
英语必修三单词表_百度文库 ... award 奖；奖品授予；判定 produce 产品；（尤指）农产品 rooster 雄禽；公鸡.

list.abs: 商务英语词汇大全_外语教育网 ... copywriter 撰稿人 producer 制片人 newscaster 新闻评论人.
以一个生产者(Producer)，消费者(Consumer)为例， 生产者向一个堆栈(SyncStack )中加入产品，字符消费者向同一个堆栈中取出产 …
They all produced in China , I presume ., 我想这些花瓶都是中国出品的吗.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in sense 3 of the verb): from Latin producere, from pro- 'forward' + ducere 'to lead'. Current noun senses date from the late 17th cent

entry.def: To produce something means to cause it to happen.

example.ex: The drug is known to produce side-effects in women...
example.tran: 据悉，这种药会对女性产生副作用。

example.ex: Talks aimed at producing a new world trade treaty have been under way for six years.
example.tran: 旨在制定出一个新的世界贸易条约的谈判已经进行了6年。

entry.def: If you produce something, you make or create it.

example.ex: The company produced circuitry for communications systems...
example.tran: 该公司为通信系统生产电路。

example.ex: I'm quite pleased that we do have the capacity to produce that much food.
example.tran: 我很高兴我们确实有能力生产这么多粮食。

entry.def: When things or people produce something, it comes from them or slowly forms from them, especially as the result of a biological or chemical process.

example.ex: These plants are then pollinated and allowed to mature and produce seed.
example.tran: 然后，这些植物就被授粉，从而成熟结籽。

example.ex: ...gases produced by burning coal and oil.
example.tran: 煤和油燃烧时产生的气体

entry.def: If you produce evidence or an argument, you show it or explain it to people in order to make them agree with you.

example.ex: They challenged him to produce evidence to support his allegations...
example.tran: 他们要他拿出证据证明自己的主张。

example.ex: Scientists have produced powerful arguments against his ideas.
example.tran: 科学家们提出了有力论据反驳他的观点。

entry.def: If you produce an object from somewhere, you show it or bring it out so that it can be seen.

example.ex: To hire a car you must produce a passport and a current driving licence...
example.tran: 租车必须出示护照和有效驾驶执照。

example.ex: She produced the knife during arguments with her friends.
example.tran: 在和朋友争吵的时候，她掏出了刀。

entry.tran: 上演（戏剧）；制作（电影、电视节目）；灌制（唱片）
entry.def: If someone produces something such as a film, a magazine, or a CD, they organize it and decide how it should be done.

example.ex: He has produced his own sports magazine called Yes Sport...
example.tran: 他推出了自己的体育杂志，叫做《是的，体育》。

example.ex: He produced 'A Chorus Line', Broadway's longest running show.
example.tran: 他制作推出了《歌舞线上》这一百老汇经久不衰的剧目。

entry.def: Produce is food or other things that are grown in large quantities to be sold.

example.ex: We manage to get most of our produce in Britain...
example.tran: 我们设法在英国搞到我们所需的大部分农产品。

example.ex: Winter produce will cost more for the next few weeks.
example.tran: 在未来几周，冬季农产品会更贵。

means.word_mean: 1. fresh fruits and vegetable grown for the market
2. create or manufacture a man-made product;

sentences.sentence: "We produce more cars than we can sell"
"The company has been making toys for two centuries"
"The new law gave rise to many complaints"
"The proud father produced many pictures of his baby"
"The accused brought forth a letter in court that he claims exonerates him"

means.word_mean: 5. bring onto the market or release;
6. cultivate by growing, often involving improvements by means of agricultural techniques;

sentences.sentence: "The Bordeaux region produces great red wines"

means.word_mean: 7. come to have or undergo a change of (physical features and attributes);

sentences.sentence: "I got funny spots all over my body"

auth_sentence.content: On Fields the combination produce their strongest work yet.
auth_sentence.res_content: On Fields the combination produce their strongest work yet.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: On Fields the combination produce their strongest work yet.

auth_sentence.content: Flood basalts on the ocean floor produce oceanic plateaus.
auth_sentence.res_content: Flood basalts on the ocean floor produce oceanic plateaus.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Flood basalts on the ocean floor produce oceanic plateaus.

auth_sentence.content: You produce about one litre of it a day.
auth_sentence.res_content: You produce about one litre of it a day.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: You produce about one litre of it a day.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 演绎,推论;扣除,减去,扣除额
stems_affixes.word_buile: deduce[v.[from]演绎,推断,推论]+tion表名词→n.演绎,推论;扣除,减去,扣除额
induce[v.引诱,劝使;引起,导致;感应]+ment具体物→n.引诱物
pro向前+duce引导,带来→引向前→生产
produce的名词化→生产出的东西
de向下+duce引导,带来→向下引→推论

stems_affixes.value_cn: 引诱,劝使;引起,导致;感应
stems_affixes.word_buile: in进入+duce引导,带来→引进去→诱导

stems_affixes.value_cn: 生产,制造,显示,演出,导致
stems_affixes.word_buile: pro向前+duce引导,带来→引向前→生产
re回+duce引导,带来→往回引→减少
tra横+duce引导,带来→向横引→不正→诽谤

Sentence.sentence: Books—especially books the average person could afford—haven't been around long enough to produce evolutionary change in humans.
Second, Americans have basically decided that they don't really want to produce all their own oil.
Printing with moveable type on paper dramatically reduced the cost of producing a book compared with the old-fashioned ones handwritten on vellum, which comes from sheepskin.

means.word_mean: 生产, 产生, 出产

sentences.en: That is an oil well that no longer produces.
sentences.cn: 那是一口不再出油的井。

sentences.en: However, this failed to produce the desired effect.
sentences.cn: 但是这并没有产生预期的效果。

sentences.en: This famous author has produced little in the last few years.
sentences.cn: 这位著名的作家近几年来作品甚少。

sentences.en: He produced three short plays between May and July.
sentences.cn: 他从五月到七月创作了三部短剧。

sentences.en: He produced his railway ticket when asked to do so.
sentences.cn: 当验票时, 他出示了火车票。

sentences.en: The girl is an authentic girl.I'll produce her for you if you want.
sentences.cn: 这个女孩很可靠, 如果你要见她, 我会带她来给你看看。

sentences.en: Jimmy's jokes produced a great deal of laughter.
sentences.cn: 吉米的笑话逗得人们哈哈大笑。

sentences.en: The troupe produced a new play last night.
sentences.cn: 剧团昨晚上演了一部新剧。

sentences.en: Female sheep produce one or two lambs at a time.
sentences.cn: 母羊一次生一至两头羊羔。

sentences.en: Money at interest produces an income.
sentences.cn: 有利息的钱带来一笔收入。

sentences.en: This is all locally grown produce.
The company markets its new produce.
sentences.cn: 该公司出售它的新产品。

jushi.english: These workers produce at a very high rate.
jushi.chinese: 工人们以非常快的速度生产。

jushi.english: He is supposed to be a very learned man, but he seems unable to produce.
jushi.chinese: 他被认为是个极有学问的人,但他似乎不能创作。

jushi.english: This famous author has produced little in the last few years.
jushi.chinese: 这位著名的作家近几年来作品甚少。
